title: Hot actress Varalakshmi Sarathkumar says TV head tried to mishbehave with her - Tamil Movie News
text: Did Vishal-Varu ask Karthi to block date for marriage? The shocking news about actress Bhavanaâ€™s molestation by animalistic persons in Kochi is still raging and now actress Varalakshmi Sarathkumar has revealed that the programming head of a popular television channel tried to misbehave with her. Industry people say that the identity of the person is not that hard to guess. If this can happen to the daughter of a powerful politician and frontline actor, looks like we have to take serious measures to protect the women of our society. Needs to be said..!! pic.twitter.com/GjJimBIKd3
